name: Ceres
intro: The infrastructure of the Decentralized Credit System
introduce: Ceres is the infrastructure of web 3.0 decentralized credit system provides readable user identities for native DApps, and a more human-acceptable user system. Ceres provides the functions of oracle protocol and reputation evaluation model. The oracle protocol is used to analyze and estimate use's on-chain transaction data efficiently and accurately. At the same time, users/project parties can use the evaluation model to analyze the quality of on-chain social graph and influence index.
